Definition: This refers to the country target to meet certain percentage of peak demand by means of given technology. Set as a design decision/suggestion.
Maximum new installed capacity limit for any country in the region. Set as design decision/suggestion.
Minimum new installed capacity limit for any country in the region. Set as design decision/suggestion.

x = Min value.
y = Minimum between Max and VRE capacity target to meet the peak demand.
The capacity upper limit is defined as the maximum value between x and y.
